Description: For sale is a 2016 Gibson Les Paul Studio 50's Tribute- Satin Gold Top, Dark Back Guitar. It plays extremely well, set up was performed by Frank Trowbridge (GuitarFranks), a well known luthier. The stock machine heads were replaced by Genuine Schaller German made Original Deluxe G series Tuners (these sell for $300.00 + per set on eBay). This guitar stays in tune. No buzzing, plek’d fretboard. The latest Dunlop Straplocks are also included, both on the guitar and for your favorite guitar strap. There are a couple of minor dings, one on the back of the neck near fret 12, and one on the side near the pick guard. Weight is 8lb 6oz. This guitar comes in a Gator hardcase and the original box. This is a very well set up guitar. It was set up for 10-46 gauge strings. About the stock 2016 Les Paul 50’s Tributes: The Les Paul Studio '50s Tribute 2016 T has a traditional Les Paul mahogany body with a grain textured, satin finish maple top, as well as a mahogany neck with a '50s profile and a 22-fret rosewood fingerboard. The time-tested selection of tonewoods, while Green Keys-style tuners and the faithful Tune-O-Matic bridge keep your tuning stability and intonation true during even the longest gigs. Tuners: Original Schaller Series G (modified) Neck width: Historic 1 11/16" neck width Nut: TekToid nut Neck heel: Classic Les Paul neck heel Carrying case: Gator Hard Case (modified) Body: Maple and mahogany with modern weight relief Pickups: 490R and 498T humbuckers Fingerboard: Thicker one-piece rosewood fingerboard Setup: Comprehensive hand-finished setup by Frank Trowbridge (modified) Neck profile: Rounded '50s neck profile
Title: Gibson Les Paul Studio 50's Tribute- Satin Gold Top, Dark Back 2016
